00041 /**************************************************************************
00042 * DEFINITIONS
00043 **************************************************************************/
00045 #define BASE_ADDRESS_OFFSET           0x0100    
00046 #define NODEPARAM_SIZE                0x00FF    
00048 #define APPLICATION_MEM_BASE_ADR      0x0000    
00049 #define APPLICATION_MEM_SIZE          0x0017    
00050 #define SYSTEMSTATE                   0x0060    
00051 #define USERRAM_BASE_ADR              0x00CE    
00052 #define USERRAM_SIZE                  0x0012    
00055 #define EEPROM_SIZE                   NODEPARAM_SIZE + APPLICATION_MEM_SIZE + USERRAM_SIZE
00056 #define MAX_EEPROM_SIZE               EEPROM_SIZE - 1    
00059 typedef struct
00060 {
00061    uint16_t addr;                               
00062    uint8_t defValue;                            
00063 } STRUCT_DEFPARAM;
